OrgName.entry: BURNT TREE CROFT RESIDENTIAL CARE HOME

Desc.entry: Residential care home run by Sheffcare Ltd, a not-for-profit provider of care. Offers 38 permanent beds and 2 temporary beds, of which 18 are for Fundamentally Mentally Infirm (FMI). Organises various types of entertainment and events throughout the year. This care home is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.
